channel.title: Need help with this error..exception
channel.description:
[code]Twilight Server 1.0 - ------------------------------------------------------- com.mysql.jdbc.Driver Connection from localhost:1674 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (localhost) java.lang.NullPointerException at process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at process.run(process.java:27) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException [/code]
Everytime I try to run the server I get this error
